promises.promiser:
mail=
instance=unique
partial=nocheck
runlevel=nocheck
idepend=nocheck
rdepend=nocheck
space=nocheck
setuid=nocheck
conflict=nocheck
action=nocheck
networktimeout=60
networkretries=3
authentication=quit
keystore=/var/sadm/security
proxy=
basedir=default

rval.value: Insert contents of Solaris admin file (automatically install packages)
(State: not installed|E: Unable to locate package .*)
(State: not installed|E: Unable to locate package .*)
